title: Crime Alert 07.22.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 07.22.19
description:
Dad shoots at naked woman who breaks into home. Man returned to jail just 7 hours after release. Woman fakes child abduction in hopes of police finding her stolen car sooner.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
